timeline.bodyText:
It's not intuitive where 14000 comes from.
I feel that the IoTDBSessionIT is out of control gradually...
It's time to remove duplicated methods such as insertTabletTest1-2-3.
Besides, there are some commented lines in test(), it should be cleaned.
I create a jira issue:  https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/IOTDB-856.
Better to fix it in this PR.
timeline.author: qiaojialin

replies.bodyText: ok,i will fix it in that PR
